# RoadMap üöÄ

A Roadmap for the BlockForge NFT project is illustrated below:

  • 1st April, 2022

    Start Earning Tokens

    Earn $FORGE tokens while playing on the BlockForge Minecraft Server. Link your account and view your balance on the BlockForge Dashboard.

  • 20th May, 2022

    Whitelist Signup Starts

    Sign up for the whitelist here. There are currently 2,500 whitelist spots available, with 3 different tiers of pricing.

  • 20th June, 2022

    Diamond Battle Pass Mint

    5,000 Diamond Battle Passes NFT passes will be available for mint. After mint, a battle pass will be required to earn $FORGE tokens and join on the BlockForge Minecraft server.

  • 22nd June, 2022

    Redeem $FORGE Token

    $FORGE tokens will become redeemable for owners of the Diamond Battle Pass. Link your Minecraft account and start accruing today.

  • 20th August, 2012

    Claim In-Game Plots

    Claim 100x100 block plots of land on the Blockforge Minecraft server using $FORGE tokens. Diamond blocks located on the land, while in battle mode, will genereate additional $FORGE tokens for the owner.

  • TBD

    Mercenary Pass Mint

    5,000 NFT Mercenary Passes will be available for mint. Earn $Forge tokens for defending battle mode enabled plots.

  • TBD

    Duel Arena Release

    Wager $FORGE tokens and battle against other users in a player vs player coliseum located on the BlockForge Minecraft server.

  • TBD

    New Worlds Release

    We plan to release additional islands and server sharding.

  • TBD

    We Want to Hear What YOU want!

    Let us know in the BlockForge Discord what you would like added to the BlockForge Metaverse.
